main event: A couple observed two unidentified flying objects streaking across the sky on 16 July 1960.
interesting points: The wife initially thought the objects were falling stars before noticing their unusual motion., The objects changed course and emitted red and orange light., The sighting was observed at a great height with no sound., An acquaintance confirmed seeing the same objects around the same time., The couple's observation lasted approximately five to ten minutes.
witness description: a husband and wife observing from their porch
